title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Let's start with news that South Korea will invest more than one.six billion U.S. dollars a year to strengthen the competitiveness of firms producing key industrial materials, parts and equipment.Finance Minister Hong Nam-ki said the investment will help establish a stable supply of key items needed by industries and reduce South Korea's reliance on Japanese imports.He added that the government will come up with a priority list for investment.In July, Tokyo imposed tighter regulations on exports to Seoul of three materials that are used to produce memory chips and displays.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
